rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Veranda
rooms.description: The entrance hall welcomes guests with a traditional Kerala-style veranda, integrating a garden view, designed per Vastu for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room and Dining Area
rooms.description: A multifunctional space that serves as both living and dining area, ensuring natural lighting with strategically placed openings and a Vastu-compliant layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed in the traditional Kerala style using locally sourced materials. It's positioned to allow proper ventilation and energy flow as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Utility/Service Area
rooms.description: This area houses storage and additional utilities in a compact design for efficient space usage.

rooms.name: Wardrobe/Closet
rooms.description: A designated closet area near the entrance ensuring convenience.

openings.details: Large wooden door with traditional carvings, aligned to south-east for positive energy flow.
Large casement windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu norms.
Provides a seamless transition between indoor living space and the garden, enhancing connectivity with nature.
Small balcony offering view towards the garden and sunrise as per Vastu recommendations.

notes: The design follows traditional Kerala style with a focus on natural light, airflow, and connectivity to nature. The layout is aligned to Vastu principles ensuring auspicious energy flow across all spaces. Structural details like roof overhangs, tiled exteriors, and intricate woodwork will be added during detailed planning.
